pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Command line tools for dev-db/spatialite, including:
* spatialite: a complete CLI front-end * spatialite_network: a tool supporting the creation of networks used by the routing algorithm * spatialite_tool: a tool supporting import/export of shapefiles * shp_doctor: a diagnostic tool to check anomalous shapefiles * exif_loader: an import tool for EXIF or EXIF-GPS pictures

use.flag: Support for sci-libs/geos, increases size considerably
